All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiAuthenticator
    Authenticates API clients (local users).
    ApiAuthorizer
    Helper class to determine if a user a role required for an operation.
    ApiClient
    This is a simple representation of an API client.
    CloudClient
    Client to communicate with the cloud service.
    CloudResponse
    A model that is used to pass responses from the cloud.
    CloudService
    Defines the different cloud services that are available.
    CloudSocketClient
    Establishes a socket (SignalR) connection to the cloud service to receive updates.
    ConnectionResource
    Handles API requests related to connections
    EventResource
    Handles callback Webhook requests from the cloud service.
    FileStorage
    Provides simple file storage mechanisms.
    GroupResource
    Handles API requests for working with group id.
    Job
    The main work model.
    JobStorage
    Handles the storage of jobs.
    MessageResource
    Handles API calls to send messages to mobile clients (audiences).
    OnyonApplication
    The main service application for Onyon Service.
    OnyonConfiguration
    Holds the configuration for the Onyon Service.
    StatusCode
    Helper enum for HTTP Status Codes.
    StatusResource
